g.text: GAME_ACTION:<action type, parameters needed by the action>
controller got notified by the RemoteGameView
the controller calls the model's function to handle the action.
Once the action has been done the model notify
back the RemoteGameView to make the clients
RemoteGameView got notified by the model.
If the during the game, the message received by the server is not a GAME_ACTION, the server simply ignores that message.
[the message received is not a GAME_ACTION]
